mapper.sql: bid, bookname, classification, babstract, press, time
mapper.insert:
insert into book
bid,
bookname,
classification,
babstract,
press,
time,
#{bid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bookname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{classification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{babstract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{press,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{time,jdbcType=DATE},
mapper.update:
update book
bookname = #{bookname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classification = #{classification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
babstract = #{babstract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
press = #{press,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=DATE},
where bid = #{bid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update book set bookname = #{bookname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classification = #{classification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, babstract = #{babstract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, press = #{press,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=DATE} where bid = #{bid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
